subject: Baseball
College Athletics
College World Series
lead_paragraph: Whit Merrifield drove in the winning run with a single in the bottom of the 11th as South Carolina beat U.C.L.A., 2-1.
snippet: Whit Merrifield drove in the winning run with a single in the bottom of the 11th as South Carolina beat U.C.L.A., 2-1.
